name: Other OS versions - Redesign Rebuild Reclaim
name_original: Other OS versions - Redesign Rebuild Reclaim
description:
This project contains other versions of original game from project at:

https://neozmatrixa.itch.io/rrr

It contains :

Windows Low End version (Recommended for old PC ) "LOW_END_RedesignRebuildReclaim.zip"

MAC version "MACRedesignRebuildReclaim.zip"

Linux11 version "Linux11.zip"
